title: Typeeto 1.4 [MAC OS X]
description:
MADE IN UKRAINE

Typeeto 1.4 â€“ Use your Mac keyboard as a Bluetooth keyboard on any device.

Typeeto is an app that allows you to use your Mac keyboard as a Bluetooth keyboard for other devices such as iPad, iPhone, Apple TV, Android device, etc. Now use a full-scale keyboard to type in text and it will be displayed in real-time on your device screen. You do not need to install any other apps on your device â€” just connect it to Mac and start typing.

Features:

- Connect any number of devices to Mac
- Copy-paste a text from Mac to connected devices
- Switch between devices in a single click or a hot key press
- Save your time and effort â€“ you do not need to set up an extra keyboard separately
- Select between Dark and Light themes
- Make use of sound effects
- Designate a hotkey to each device
- The deviceâ€™s type is detected automatically, but you can always change it in Preferences
- Enjoy our cool animation

To start working with Typeeto follow these 3 simple steps:
Turn on Bluetooth on Mac and a device youâ€™d like to connect, make sure that both of them are discoverable
Go to Bluetooth settings on Mac and pair the device
Connect your device to Mac. Remember that for iOS devices, you need to initiate the connection from them first

Whatâ€™s new in version 1.4:

- Improved overall application stability
- Some other minor improvements
